com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure

Class Quadtree<Number extends java.lang.Comparable,Element>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.StructureObject
      • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.Quadtree<Number,Element>
  • Type Parameters:
    Number - A Type of Number
    Element - The type of class that this quadtree will be containing

    public final class Quadtree<Number extends java.lang.Comparable,Element>
extends StructureObject
    One of the most important classes in the entire engine: The Quadtree

    This object is meant to store all the existing game object and their locations. Then it is able to retrieve a list of those that are within a certain area. This is crucial for many parts of the engine that iterate on lists of actor as they are no longer required to check the entire list of everything that currently exists. Massive decrease in time wasted on iteration by classes such as actor because the pathing will now only check for nearby actors. Most optimal retrieval time achievable is log4(N) where N is the number of object in the quadtree and by extension the time for iteration on the entire list.

    Version:
    Pre-A
    Author:
    Spartak
